subject: Re: Maybe good news,
author: jamietreetalker
full_text:
Nothing official yet, but here are a couple of articles about Elenin mysteriously disintegrating:

http://www.digitaljournal.com/article/311009
http://www.skyandtelescope.com/observing/highlights/128708798.html

Jamie

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> David the Spirit Tech, (if I am hearing him correctly) says, that "comet,  
> Elenin was destroyed yesterday 8-31-11 he said it completely  
> disintegrated."  Our good old Sun took it out so, if this is true, it's a  true blessing 
> for this planet, and we should all thank God.  Planet X, aka  Nebaru sp is 
> still on it's way, don't know what's going to happen with it yet.  sf
>
